statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.description: Saint Mary's pushes past Loyola Marymount 72-63
article.headline: Saint Mary's pushes past Loyola Marymount 72-63
article.linkText: Saint Mary's pushes past Loyola Marymount 72-63
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Aaron Bright finished with 24 points and six assists as Saint Mary's pushed past Loyola Marymount 72-63 on Saturday. The Gaels (11-3, 4-0 West Coast) shot 41.1 percent from the field and Bright sank 6 of the team's 11 3-pointers. Kerry Carter chipped in 17 points, Brad Waldow had 13 with 11 rebounds and Garrett Jackson added 11 points. Evan Payne paced the Lions (4-11, 0-3) with 24 points, David Humphries had 10 and Chase Flint dished out seven assists. Loyola Marymount shot 43.6 percent overall, but went just 4 of 12 from deep. Bright and Carter each sank a pair of 3-pointers to jump out to a 14-4 lead early. The Lions pulled within three after Payne's jumper to open the second half, but Carter followed with a three-point play and two 3-pointers to go back up by 10. Saint Mary's led comfortably the rest of the way.
